pmhal_ina226.h File Reference
PRCM Statistics

This file contains the APIs to program and read the INA226 power measurement ICs. More...

#include <ti/drv/pm/include/prcm/pmhal_prcm.h>
#include <ti/drv/pm/include/prcm/pmhal_i2cComm.h>

Detailed Description

This file contains the APIs to program and read the INA226 power measurement ICs.
